title: League client not starting
body:
Whenever I try and open league, the logo pops with the grey bar underneath it like normal. Task manager sasys that the lol client and patcher etc are open but the client never actually pops  up. Then a long while after (like an hour) this error pops up
"BugSplatRC resource DLL not found" and then task manager indicates that all of the league programs shut down. I've tried the usual uninstalling and reinstalling and have no idea how to fix this

running windows 10
gtx 750m
i7 4770s

replies.body:
Heres something to mention I have update windows 10 (small updates) on 18-March-2016 after that I am stuck with this problem where the logo appears for a brief moment and it goes away.
The patcher.exe and LoLPatcherUX.exe runs in the background but the LoLPatcher.exe rises in memory for a good solid hour or more and I get the message BusgplatRC resource dll not found
I repeat "AFTER windows update"

What this sounds like is that the patcher is failing to self-patch.  There's a couple reasons this could happen, but the first step would be to make sure you're attempting to run League as an administrator (right click the icon and choose "Run as Administrator").

Let me know if that helps!

I've tried running as an admin, turning off compatibility mode, and uninstalling my antivirus. Still no dice.

 Is there another solution?

EDIT: It was because Advast was detecting League as a virus. I had to add an exclusion to it. =/ derp.
yea i did, the same result occurs sadly {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

Uninstall your antivirus
Riot support told me to do so and my launcher is back
Did u recently update ur windows?

I have the EXACT same problem 
I created a board on it as well
Ive tried many possible things but allas its hopeless

I updated to windows 10 a while back and have been playing on it and it has been working well, this just kind of happened randomly one day.

It's not that big of a deal if I can't find a fix, I'm finishing up my new pc build in like two weeks so ill be moving to that one anyway
no it says LoLPatcher.exe has stopped working

heres the link to my boards which contains all the solutions I tried and other information:
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/R6BL2mfv-game-does-not-open-the-launch-screen-after-the-logo-appears-help
